price: 30. Mpe topesaki Dáwud likabo ya mowumbu ya malamu Suleyman, ya soló, azalaki kosenga bolimbisi mingi.
arabic: وَوَهَبۡنَا لِدَاوُۥدَ سُلَيۡمَٰنَۚ نِعۡمَ ٱلۡعَبۡدُ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wawahabnā lidāwūda sulaymāna niʿ'ma al-ʿabdu innahu awwābun
